price: The throes of death will come with the truth[11]. This is what you were trying to avoid.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ سَكۡرَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِ بِٱلۡحَقِّۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنۡهُ تَحِيدُ
footnotes: [11] When a disbeliever or a heedless person is in death throes, he will realize that resurrection and reckoning are true.
